text:
THE UNIVERSITY OF WISCONSIN
MADISON 6
September 28, 1961
Samuel L. Becker, Chairman
NAEB Research Committee
Division of Television, Radio, Film
University of Iowa
Iowa City, Iowa
Dear Sam:
I’m sorry I wonTt be able to make NAEB this time,
I’m especially sorry since I seem to have represented you and the com¬
mittee on a couple of occasions, I think you’ve been informed of the
outcome of the trip to Washington to "advise” on the need survey. This
was the usual case of getting research advice after the fat is in the
fire.
I enjoyed the work session here and took quite a lot of time from classes
to take part. The outcome in this case is represented by the statement
on research contained in our draft statement, dince this largely repre¬
sented viewpoints expressed by me, I hope it meets with the committee’s
approval.
Regards to you and the rest. Sorry to be a poop-out.
Yours,
BHWsbfm
Br^ice H. Westley
Associate Professor
